snippet: “The Escape Artist” stars David Tennant and Sophie Okonedo as rival barristers, and Toby Kebbell as a suspected killer, on “Masterpiece Mystery!”
abstract: Mike Hale reviews television program The Escape Artist, opening new season of Masterpiece Mystery! on PBS; episode stars David Tennant.
lead_paragraph: “The Escape Artist” stars David Tennant and Sophie Okonedo as rival barristers, and Toby Kebbell as a suspected killer, on “Masterpiece Mystery!”

headline.seo: David Tennant Stars in ‘The Escape Artist’ on PBS
